text: wlqd atayna musaa tise mejzat wadhat shahdat ealaa sidq nbwth why: aleasa walyd walsnwn wanaqs althamarat waltwfan waljarad walqumal waldafadie waldm, fas'al -ayha alrswl- alyhwd sual taqrir hyn ja' musaa aslafhm bmejzath alwadhat, faqal fireawn lmwsa: 'iiniy la'azunuk -ya mwsa- sahra, mkhdweana mghlwbana ealaa eqlk bima tatyh min ghrayb alafeal
